data.client_settings: Microsoft Edge 42.17134.1.0 Microsoft EdgeHTML 17.17134 / Discord's site, not client
data.actual_result: Discord's Jobs page is stuttering up and down when scrolling down
data.expected_result: Discord's Jobs page is supposed to be stabilized and not stutter up or down when scrolling
data.short_description: Discord's Jobs page's doesn't scroll smoothly
data.steps_to_repro: - Get Microsoft Edge - Go to  (If link is not shown before this text, go to Discord's Jobs page - Start scrolling down - You will notice that it starts to lag a little bit up and down - Compare this experience with Chrome - You will notice that Chrome is stable and has no seizure like Edge
